meanings.definition: The smallest or lowest amount or degree possible.
meanings.sent1: I always try to meet the minimums for my homework.
meanings.sent2: The teacher set the minimums for passing the test.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to jump over the minimums of the fence, but couldn't make it.
meanings.sent4: Her patience was at its minimums, and she couldn't wait any longer.
meanings.sent5: The minimums of the lake were so clear, you could see the fish swimming below.

meanings.definition: The least amount required or allowed.
meanings.sent1: He paid the minimums for his parking ticket.
meanings.sent2: The store had a policy of no returns for items below the minimums.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel gathered the minimums of nuts needed for the winter.
meanings.sent4: His energy levels were at their minimums after a long day at work.
meanings.sent5: The minimums of sugar in the recipe were crucial for the cake to turn out just right.
